title: New Web Site Launched by Allmapdata from Mapmechanics
text:
New Web Site Launched by Allmapdata from Mapmechanics October 12, 2015 03:30 AM   
LONDON- Practical and convenient access to information on digital mapping and related data is offered through a brand new web site ( allmapdata.com ) launched by the allmapdata team at Mapmechanics. 
Allmapdata supplies and supports the world’s widest range of digital mapping and geodemographic data. Its products are used extensively in a vast range of activities involving business intelligence (BI), map-based planning and geographic information systems (GIS) – from territory management to market analysis, from vehicle tracking to delivery scheduling. 
The new allmapdata web site is fully responsive, scaling intelligently on desktops, tablets and smartphones while continuing to present a clear and logical navigation hierarchy on all platforms. 
The design brief for the new site was to make it easier than ever before to navigate the range and depth of map data on offer. Products are presented under easily-understood headings with separate tabs for introductory information, features, attributes, case studies screenshots and videos for individual products. 
Throughout the site, the informative text explains not only what is provided in each dataset, but also how it can be used in practical applications. 
Under the section headed “Data uses”, tabs provide further detail of topical issues, pricing and licensing models for uses such as BI, geomarketing, GIS, ASP (application service providers), insurance telematics, IoT (internet of things) and smart cities. 
The site offers data on CD, DVD, via cloud platforms or as immediate downloads from the Microsoft Azure cloud computing platform. 
News about current developments is especially accessible and is constantly updated. Company and industry news, case studies and tweets are all presented on the same page, and news can be filtered by categories such as “demographics” and “territory management”. 
For more information about allmapdata products and services visit the new web site at allmapdata.com or call UK +44 (0)20 8568 7000 or US +1 (727) 483-5562 
About allmapdata from Mapmechanics 
• The allmapdata team from Mapmechanics assembles, configures, formats and distributes a wide range of data products for use with IoT, smart cities, logistics, retail, business intelligence and insurance telematics. The company’s extensive worldwide portfolio includes products originated by HERE Maps, GfK and MBR geodemographics, GeoConcept GIS, Maponics US boundaries, DnB business data and many more. 
• The products are used in a diverse range of fields such as depot planning, retail site location analysis, marketing, healthcare, environmental planning and management, transport and logistics, territory allocation and telematics. Contacts
